oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Time To Shine - 1944-02-23 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WLW (Cincinnati, OH) radio program Time To Shine, originally broadcast February 23, 1944 (part 1). Featuring the Buccaneers including Captain Stubby (Tom C. Fouts), Dwight E. "Tiny" Stokes, and Buddy Ross; Grandpappy Doolittle; and Dolly Good; with announcer Cecil (last name unknown), and host Jimmy Leonard.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buccaneers; Dolly Good; Tiny Stokes; Captain Stubby
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Cecil [last name unknown]) -- Opening statement (Jimmy Leonard) -- Cast talk -- Margie (Buccaneers, Dolly Good) -- Jimmy Leonard introduces Tiny Stokes -- Red Skies In The Night (Tiny Stokes) -- Jimmy Leonard talks -- Down Where The Cuckoos Nest (Captain Stubby, Buccaneers)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WLW (Radio Station : Cincinnati, Ohio); Time to shine (Radio program); Captain Stubby and the Buccaneers (Musical group); Stubby, Captain, 1918-2004; Stokes, Dwight E., 1920-1999; Ross, Buddy; Good, Dolly, 1915-1967; Leonard, Jimmy
